constraints.name: rooted_tree
constraints.description: 有根树结构约束，每个节点最多有 m 个子节点

constraints.name: subtree_ordering
constraints.description: 子树顺序约束，从左到右每一棵子树必须相同

constraints.name: unlabeled_nodes
constraints.description: 无标号节点约束，节点之间没有区别

constraints.name: modular_arithmetic
constraints.description: 结果取模约束，最终结果对 10,007 取模
